text: European Weightlifting Championships is an annual event organised by the European Weightlifting Federation (EWF). It has been held since 1896. A separate event for women was held from 1988 to 1997, after which both championships have been held as one event. ==Other websites== *European Weitlifting Federation *International Weightlifting Federation (IWF) *European Championships From 1907 to Today @ Lift Up: Search *Database Weightlifting *IWRP Category:Weightlifting competitions Category:European championships
title: European Weightlifting Championships
